tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    dob DATE,
    gender CHAR(1),
    medical_history TEXT,
    medications TEXT,
    next_appointment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    doctor VARCHAR(50),
    reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  record_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment VARCHAR(150),
  date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  date_of_diagnosis DATE,
  prescription VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  doctor VARCHAR(50),
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medical_history (patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(id),
  condition VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medications (patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(id),
  medication_name VARCHAR(100),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  frequency VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(id),
  appointment_date DATE,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (doctor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  specialty VARCHAR(100)
)
